topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55946bab636872635a000564#post_55946bab636872635a000564
It was probably a squirrel or a bird that got electrocuted.  Sometimes if they fuck up they might get 10k volts; it's why you see squirrels hopping on them while running.  I once saw a dumb squirrel just running without doing that hopping motion try to cross the part where the wires intersect and he went *ZAP!*
